entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 11.
